snippet: India’s Supreme Court on Monday ordered the lifting of a ban on women working as makeup artists in the movie industry, ending a discriminatory practice that has endured for decades.
lead_paragraph: India’s Supreme Court on Monday ordered the lifting of a ban on women working as makeup artists in the movie industry, ending a discriminatory practice that has endured for decades.

headline.main: India: Court Allows Women to Work as Makeup Artists in Film Industry
headline.print_headline: India: Court Allows Women to Work as Makeup Artists in Film Industry
